Sentencas: The paper discusses the development of a new material system for interconnect application in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC) based on TiC-Ti3Al.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles

Sentencas: Nano-sized TiC powders utilized in this research were synthesized using carbon coated TiO2 precursors from a patented process.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles

Sentencas: The pressureless sintering of TiC-Ti3Al in a vacuum was applied at temperatures between 1100 degrees C and 1500 degrees C and content of Ti3Al was varied in the range of 10-40 wt%.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscope (SEM) were used for phase evaluation and sintering behavior.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles

Sentencas: Relative density increased markedly with increasing sintering temperature because of grain growth and formation of the Ti(3)AIC(2) secondary phase.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles

Sentencas: Dense products ( > 95% TD) were prepared from nanosized TiC powders with 10 and 20 wt% Ti3Al, but with about 8 to 10% porosity for 30 and 40 wt% Ti3Al.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles

Sentencas: The mechanical properties were determined from Vickers hardness and fracture toughness calculations.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles

Sentencas: Vickers hardness decreased and fracture toughness increased with increasing Ti3Al content.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity and oxidation behavior of TiC-Ti3Al composites were investigated to evaluate the feasibility for SOFC interconnect application.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity measurements in the air at 800 degrees C for 100 h were made using the Kelvin 4-wire method.
Titulo: Sintering, mechanical, electrical and oxidation properties of ceramic intermetallic TiC-Ti3Al composites obtained from nano-TiC particles
